title: Retry build and deploy with no code changes

requirements.summary: Re-run the existing build and deployment workflow exactly as-is (same source state) without modifying any frontend code, assets, or caching behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is executed without modifying any frontend or backend source files
Deployment completes successfully without the prior deployment error
The deployed app is reachable and loads its existing functionality as-is

file_operations.description: No-op verification only: open and confirm the authentication/routing logic remains unchanged; do not edit and do not commit any changes. This is to ensure the retry deploy uses the exact same source state.

No-op verification only: confirm asset canister cache-control rules are unchanged; do not modify caching rules and do not commit any changes. This ensures the retry deploy does not change asset behavior.
